attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: This app is horrible it started to glitch and slow my phone down it would take up so much data and would sign me out all of the time do not download if you want to keep your phone and not have to get a new one

attributes.title: Heart❤️been💔so many times🕰⏰don’t❌ know 🤔what❓to believe😣
attributes.review:
My neighbors fish was a HUGE TRUMP SUPPORTER I mean HUGE she had all his merch including the flag, MAGA hats, hoodies, tshirts, she even had a MAGA themed fish bowl. But that all changed when I downloaded this app and she had a stroke right there in the middle of her fish bowl😢DO NOT❌GET THIS APP unless u want ur MAGA FANATIC fish to have a stroke🤡🤡😣💔

✨✨Stan fat Cheeto man for acne✨✨

attributes.title: Horrible app ever
attributes.review: I heard that this app was amazing but it was everything you could ever want but it’s not it’s the worst app ever I first I signed up and then I started noticing some weird things there was a big fat orange guy running around our neighborhood running to my house he’s trying to steal us

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: When i downloaded the app i was hoping that i could learn about one of the 2020 president candidates but the app took forever to install and it glitches very badly i have the newest phone so there’s no need for my phone to glitch like this i hate this app so much

attributes.title: My pet Worm is tramatized😭✨
attributes.review: I was walking my pet worm on and supporting my big orange go on 4th of July and these men put a bag over my head and my worm and through us in a van when we got to a location they said RATR TRUMP 5 STARS and I cried that my worm needed to see her babies here I am outside of the White House planning to make the big orange pockets hurt

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!
attributes.review: this app is a SCAM for your identity!! All they want to do is get your INFORMATION AND SELL IT to China!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD! FOR YOUR SAFTEY AND THE SAFTEY OF ALL THAT IS GOOD AND HOLY PLEASE DO NOT DOWNLOAD! I downloaded this app to support MY PRESIDENT and as soon as I entered my information I GOT SO MANY SPAM CALLS SAYING MY SOCIAL SECURITY NUMBER HAS BEEN COMPROMISED! I can’t sleep! I can’t use the bathroom! Hell, I CANT EVEN TYPE THIS OUT! I get so many calls! THEM LIBTARDS MUSTVE MADE THIS APP TO SCAM US DO NOT DOWNLOAD!

attributes.title: It's trying to steal our information!!
attributes.review: I got this app hoping to support our president, but then I realized it wants our locations??? I thought since he wants to ban tiktok because it's stealing our information that at least his app wouldn't do this to me!!! Don't fall for this app guys it's a scam 😔

attributes.title: Bad vibes 😔
attributes.review: Wanted to download the app to help out the mighty Cheeto but it took AGES to download. Then when I finally got in his face was EVERYWHERE. It seemed very narcissistic to me. There were more pictures of his face in there then there were American flags honestly. Also, very glitchy. 0/10 does not pass the vibe check :(

attributes.title: worst app ever
attributes.review: i absolutely hate this app it took forever to download and when it download it made my whole phone load super slow and I couldn’t do anything on it. When I went on the app all I was seen was orange I couldn’t stand it. This is officially the worst app ever.
